name: copy-path
title: Copy Path
description: Copy the path of the open folder, selected file or the URL of the current browser tab.
author: koinzhang

commands.name: copy-path
commands.title: Copy Path or URL
commands.description: Copy the path of the open folder, selected file or the URL of the current browser tab.

preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.name: showCopyTip
preferences.label: Show Copy Tip
preferences.description: Display a prompt when copying is successful.

preferences.name: showLastCopy
preferences.label: Show Last Copy
preferences.description: Show the path or URL of the most recent copy in the subtitle of the command.

preferences.name: showTabTitle
preferences.label: Show Tab Title
preferences.description: Show the tab title of the browser when copying the URL of the current browser tab.

preferences.name: useTildeForHome
preferences.label: Use Tilde for Home Directory
preferences.description: Replace the home directory in copied paths with '~' for a cleaner look.

preferences.name: multiPathSeparator
preferences.title: Multi-path Separator
preferences.description: The separator between paths when copying multiple file paths.

preferences.name: copyUrlContent
preferences.title: URL Format
preferences.description: When copying URLs, select what to copy.

preferences.name: copyWhenUnSupported
preferences.title: Unsupported App Action
preferences.description: When copying, select what to copy when the app is not supported.
